resources.string: Only the gods could defeat Aelstrom, and even then, death was unable to wrestle my soul away!
Ahhh… Feels a bit different, no? Let the air fill your lungs, friend. You have been reborn - like a little baby - So weak you are!
Yes. And by the looks of your puniness, it won’t be the last time either! Ha ha! Lucky for you, in Aeternum the worthy get to keep their souls.
What makes one worthy, exactly?
You must be like Aelstrom- strong, daring, and the most immortal of all immortals. The more you laugh at death, the stronger your soul becomes!
How many times have you laughed at death?
Many, MANY times. So many, Aelstrom has lost count. But you- you have only tasted death once. Perhaps you should start by staying alive.
So which is it? Stay alive or die?
First one, then the other. Is this not clear?
Not really. No.
I cannot blame you for being confused. You are very small. I offer you this challenge, then. Live in the face of all Aeternum's might, untouched by death, and I shall reward you.
And THEN I die?

No! Yes. If you die, this is fine. You may then prove your worth to Aelstrom by dying and finding life again... and again... and again! So long as you do as Aelstrom tells you, your soul shall endure! It will be so!
What do I get out of this?
That is a ridiculous question. Aelstrom tires of this conversation. Get yourself some little tools and practice using them. You will need them for what is to come!
Wait, I died?
Lifting rocks and breaking twigs, this is good for the circulation. Now, show Aelstrom what you have made.
Good enough. A little on the small side, but so are you. These will suffice until you can make something to be proud of!
What's next?
Eager to taunt death? Aelstrom will hold you back no longer! We will meet in the tavern in Corinth.
Corinth tavern. Got it, see you there!
Perhaps you should take a moment to practice swinging those tools of yours on the journey, yes? Off you go!
They are pretty basic...
Still surviving, I see! Good. It would be disappointing to win our little competition so soon.
You do not look as though you broke a sweat. We should fix this. What is a friendly competition without some exertion?
Look how much you’ve grown, friend! You’ve earned a moment to breathe.
Ah, you’ve got the goods. Now it’s time to add some sweat and pride! Craft them into something you can use.
Make yourself something to be proud of- eh? Something Powerful! Something from your own two hands! These are the only ingredients that REALLY matter.
Sweat and... pride?
Only the gods could defeat Aelstrom, and even then, death was unable to wrestle my soul away!
Ahhh… Feels a bit different, no? Let the air fill your lungs, friend. You have been reborn - like a little baby - So weak you are!
Yes. And by the looks of your puniness, it won’t be the last time either! Ha ha! Lucky for you, in Aeternum the worthy get to keep their souls.
What makes one worthy, exactly?
You must be like Aelstrom- strong, daring, and the most immortal of all immortals. The more you laugh at death, the stronger your soul becomes!
How many times have you laughed at death?
Many, MANY times. So many, Aelstrom has lost count. But you- you have only tasted death once. Perhaps you should start by staying alive.
So which is it? Stay alive or die?
FIrst one, then the other. Is this not clear?
Not really. No.
I cannot blame you for being confused. You are very small. I offer you this challenge, then. Live in the face of all Aeternum's might, untouched by death, and I shall reward you.
And THEN I die?

No! Yes. If you die, this is fine. You may then prove your worth to Aelstrom by dying and finding life again... and again... and again! So long as you do as Aelstrom tells you, your soul shall endure! It will be so!
What do I get out of this?
That is a ridiculous question. Aelstrom tires of this conversation. Get yourself some little tools and practice using them. You will need them for what is to come!
Wait, I died?
Lifting rocks and breaking twigs, this is good for the circulation. Now, show Aelstrom what you have made.
Good enough. A little on the small side, but so are you. These will suffice until you can make something to be proud of!
What's next?
Eager to taunt death? Aelstrom will hold you back no longer! We will meet in the tavern in Corinth.
Corinth tavern. Got it, see you there!
Perhaps you should take a moment to practice swinging those tools of yours on the journey, yes? Off you go!
They are pretty basic...
Ah, this is the stuff. Only in Brightwood. Misery often makes for excellent ale.
This dark corruption doesn't just twist the body, hmm? It inflates ego too. It takes strong will to not give in. You handled yourself well...
Good, you made it. Have a drink! You will need it.
Here you will find even more powerful materials to craft even more impressive goods! They are, of course, harder to acquire, but Aelstrom has faith in you.
Ah. This again.
Do not sound so disappointed! Growing one's strength ordinarily takes years of patience and copious lifting of heavy objects. This is much faster, yes?
You have a point.
Aelstrom is wise AND strong. Maybe one day you will be too. Off with you!
Oh? What am I doing next?
You return! Confident. Prepared. Flush with shiny things.
Not yet! There is one more source of power that may interest you. It will be a perilous journey, but I think you are equal to it.
An opportunity to die by the sound of it.
An opportunity to begin your legend! There is an abandoned mine beneath the Amrine Temple. A brave but sadly weak soul guards what you seek.
So... defeat them. Got it.
It sounds simple, but the corruption inside is... dark. It endlessly twists and pulls victims... no longer human. Those who seek its truth lose their sanity and never return.
That's quite a tone shift, Aelstrom.
There was one - Simon Grey - a scholar. Proud. Curious. Now lost and said to have become a beast of muscle and madness. How could one so curious be consumed?!
Woah.
Lucky for you, strength alone won’t keep you alive. This will test your speed, mind, soul... the parts you cannot forge or hide behind steel. Good luck!
Now I make some armor?
There is much you can craft with this. A bigger sword, boots with a bit of lift ... and maybe a taller stool.
I’m really not that small...
Small in stature only, my friend. Now use these mighty things you have gathered. Your strength depends on it!
Sure did.
Your confidence has grown. This pleases Aelstrom.
Well friend... Aelstrom has given you the wisdom to thrive in this corrupted mess.
Welcome to hell, friend! I should have told you to bring a coat! Ha ha! Come, come... There is much work to do.
Think? You should know! Go wrestle power from the land and darkness here. Come back when your pack is heavier than your doubt.
Thanks, I think I can handle myself.
Let’s see... You seem more sure of yourself now. Grittier. Sweaty, even.
Good! Make decisions with confidence... intention. You will survive another day. Now go craft with that same intention, yes?
Sweat and pride!
Haha! Yes!
How sweet of you to say.
Today is probably not the day you die, so fight like it!
Well, friend? Is this where your story ends!?
You’ve come all this way... Tell me, friend - any doubts still whispering in your ear? Even the brave hear ghosts on the quiet road.
Your belief is thicker than your armor then. You will need both and plenty of it. The Empress' forces will show you no mercy!
I will try not to die.
And if you do...
I will return intact.
You make Aelstrom proud. Bring a little tear to his eye.
Nope. None.
Every fool wants to be a hero. Few are stubborn enough to make the world remember.
Have you heard of the Elysian Wilds? Deceptively beautiful lands to the deep south.
This... is New Corsica. Built out of spite from the sun and granted shade by the monuments of legends.
She is... like a drunk noble. Regal, dangerous, may collapse at anytime. And yet... she stands - Like you, yes? Hard to not respect that... but Aelstrom welcomes the challenge. Ha!
... I'll be going, now.
Aelstrom will be here! Even though there is sand in the ale, he would not miss hearing of your great deeds!
I’m speechless.
In the Wilds, you either become more than you were... or you cease being anything at all. Go find your truth before the truth finds you unprepared.
Aelstrom knows your legend will eclipse his. Eventually.
You can feel the ground breath here. This place is alive. The souls of heroes and legends enrich the earth. Do you feel it?
The path you walk from here will show you who you really are. What you are capable of... or maybe a fate you cannot escape.
Yeah... it's eerie, yet beautiful.
Mid-quest check in
N/A
Complete the Quest
You made it in one piece I see! This is good. Aelstrom would be disappointed to have won our little competition so soon.
N/A
Complete the Quest
You made it in one piece I see! This is good. Aelstrom would be disappointed to have won our little competition so soon.
What am I competing for?
Bragging rights! Stories to tell your admirers! Fame! And the knowledge that your soul is as strong as the mightest soul in Aeternum...!
... Yours?

NOW you understand. A worthy goal and a worthy prize, yes? One should be so lucky! You should begin by girding those loins of yours. You need armor, weapons, perhaps even a little adornment for your skinny neck.
Right. I do feel a little exposed.
You do not have Aelstrom's physique to protect you. It is understandable. Now. Go and find the materials you will need to make these things. Try not to die during your search, yes?
Do you need someone to hold your hand? It is very small.
Uh. No thank you.
That's the spirit! Off you go.
Complete the Quest
Feels good, doesn’t it?! Putting in the work, making something real.
Yeah, I feel accomplished!
And did you sweat?
Yes?
Yes! And I see your pride. It is as I told you- two ingredients.
That sounds nice.
Come - there’s a tavern in Brightwood that pours something strong enough even for me. We will find you a new challenge there.
Aelstrom will meet you in Brightwood.
Complete the Quest
You return! And better dressed than before.
How do I look?
Like a tiny monarch in the making. You are well on your way to greatness! Your deeds will be sung in ballads through the ages!
Thanks
If you are truly ready to bleed for something bigger... come to Warden’s Rise.
What’s out there?
The Corrupted have grown stronger. More resilient. Greater foes wait to you to test your strength!
And I assume they have more materials.
Well. Yes. I see you are beginning to understand Aelstrom's method. He does not need to tell you what comes next! Off we go to Great Cleave!
Off to Great Cleave with you!
Complete the Quest
You created something that may actually withstand in the elements. It even makes you a little taller.
I feel good.
Now, Aelstrom must follow the Darkness to Ebonscale, where it is no longer safe for child’s play. For this... Aelstrom must go alone.
Right.
Now is when you are meant to argue, yes? Say something... Noble.. or foolish...
Oh. Uh.
Aelstrom will wait.
A dull blade... is still lethal... in the hands--
Giant hands.
GIANT hands... of a true warrior!
Haha! You understand Aelstrom. Come friend. We’ll bring light to the darkness in Ebonscale!
Our adventure continues in Ebonscale Reach!
Complete the Quest
History will smile on this moment. Legends will be born from the death of this darkness. "Even Aelstrom was impressed," they’ll say.
I did good, huh?
Yes! The stories will forget about your puny hands. They’ll make statues of you as big as Simon Grey! Aelstrom will stand taller than Helios in Rhodes!
Not even close.
Aha! Yes! You have come this far. Through darkness, decay and worse. And yet... you live!
More or less!
You have earned the right to go further. As the danger grows, so do you! Every scar avenged. Every doubt extinguished.
Where to next?
To the north is the Jewel in Aeternum’s cracked crown - New Corsica. Where heroes are made! Meet me at the tavern.
Aelstrom cannot wait to taste the ale in New Corsica.
Complete the Quest
Your works speak to your accomplishment. Truly strong hands wrought these into being.
I think that's the nicest thing you've said to me.
Praise is earned! And you have more than earned it.
Deceptive?
Where the souls of heroes and the virtuous were at peace. Now, awaken by the corrupted wilds. Nature’s beauty weaponized. A true testing ground for your truth.
I'm ready.
Yes. Aelstrom thinks you are.
The Elysian Wilds call to you, do they not?
Complete the Quest
All my life I thought legends were born through bloodline. And yet... you live! Through the odds and against the gods - You live!
I live!
I thought I had seen it all on Aeternum. But you... Through sweat and pride! With your own two hands! Sure... your hands... hmm... had guidance from Aelstrom too...
I'm grateful to you.
You have forged more than a legendary hero in you. You have also forged in Aelstrom something I have forgotten...
What is that?
You have my respect. I am proud to say we stood side by side. When the stories of your journey reach across my table, I will be excited to say...
You’re not going to cry... are you?
.. That Aelstrom... had a BIG hand in your success! Haha! Aelstrom has been wanting to say that since Brightwood... Ha ha ha!
